docs.title: Home
docs.text:
Documentation for modifying HQ, HJ, HX, HZ, WB Holdens. These are classified as the '7th generation' but is most commonly referred to as HQ-WB.

The motivation for this site is to document proven modifications. All data has been crowdsourced and references have been provided.

Thank you to all who have contributed. The site is being updated on a best effort basis. Please contact @ocampus for any additions, amendments or feedback 🙏

docs.title: Updates
docs.text:
Recently completed

  • Alternator
  • Starter

Backlog

  • Ignition

docs.title: Aussie Desert Cooler, PWR, Race Radiators
docs.text:
• $$$$
  • Copper or aluminium
  • All highly regarded
  • Commonly used for burnout cars

docs.title: Adrad (Copper)
docs.text:
• $$$
  • Ebay

docs.title: OEM GMH V8 Radiator (Copper)
docs.text:
• $$
  • Harder to find
  • Recondition highly recommended

docs.title: Worley (Aluminium)
docs.text:
• $
  • Best of the ebay brands
  • OEM mounting points
  • Recommended to mount with grommets
  • Not as effective as copper radiators

docs.title: Water pump
docs.text: GMB is the only one that has a cast impeller

docs.title: Alternator
docs.text:
Key Considerations

  • Higher amperage is recommended when adding non standard components e.g. thermo fan
  • Lower gauge wiring is recommended if a higher amperage alternator is installed
  • Standard pulley size is required to maintain the alternator's operating RPM in order function effectively

Quick Info

  • All options are bolt in
  • 6 and 8 cylinder engines use the same alternator
  • OEM part is Bosch

docs.title: Bosch (BXH1238A)
docs.text:
• 70A
  • Factory alternator for HG-WB
  • Easily found second hand (reconditioning recommended)
  • Voltage regulator is external and can be easily replaced
  • Reliable

docs.title: Aftermaket
docs.text:
• Usually 100A, 120A, 140A
  • All use an internal voltage regulator
  • Internal voltage regulator may not be serviceable or have a replacement available if it does fail
  • Slightly cheaper than Bosch
  • Reports of failure even with more reputable aftermarket brands e.g. Aeroflow

docs.title: Bosch (BXH1231A)
docs.text:
• 85A
  • Factory alternator for VN-VR V8
  • Not commonly found second hand
  • Voltage regulator is external and can be easily replaced
  • Adapter plug for Bosch RE60 voltage regulator required (easily sourced)
  • Similar price to lower amperage model
  • Reliable

docs.title: Ignition
docs.text:
Ignition is a primary component in keeping an engine running reliably. The most common upgrade is switching from points to a electronic ignition. The main reasoning is that electronic ignition is basically maintenance and adjustment free.

OEM Ignition Types

Red (HT-HZ): Points

Blue (WB-VH): Electronic

Black (VK-VL): Electronic

docs.title: ICE Ignition
docs.text:
• $$$$
  • Most reliable
  • 🦘 Australian
  • Regraph included
  • Excellent support

docs.title: MSD Ignition
docs.text:
• $$$
  • Newer models aren’t as reliable
  • American
  • Rev limiter
  • Avoid ready to run

docs.title: Bosch (OEM)
docs.text:
• $$
  • OEM (blue motor onwards)
  • As reliable as ICE
  • Requires refurbish
  • Small cap required for Edelbrock performer manifold

docs.title: Scorcher
docs.text:
• $$
  • Trusted
  • 🦘 Australian
  • Regraph included
  • Excellent support

docs.title: Blueprint (Scorcher)
docs.text:
• $
  • Remanufactured by Scorcher
  • Fully rebuilt China and strengthened
  • Regraph included
  • Excellent support

docs.title: Other
docs.text:
• Cheapest
  • Feedback never consistent
  • High module failure (non-Bosch)

docs.title: Starter motor
docs.text:
Key Considerations

  • VN-VT V8 gear reduction starter motors are more compact, high torque but do not fit when using the factory exhaust manifold

Quick Info

  • All options are bolt in but may require alignment shims
  • OEM part is Bosch

docs.title: Standard
docs.text: No options available

docs.title: JAS (SNB010)
docs.text: • The most reliable out of the Bosch copies

docs.title: OEX (BXS0165)
docs.text:
• Many reports of failure and fitment issues
  • Warranty claims are a pain point

docs.title: Bosch (BXH136)
docs.text:
• Factory on VN-VT V8
  • Most reliable
  • Unavailable new
  • Can be found second hand (reconditioning recommended)

docs.title: Aeroflow (AF4250-5310), CRS (RS03)
docs.text:
• Most expensive new option
  • Adjustable mounting position for clearance
